attributes.additional_details:
The English receive the same amount of democratic representation and the same amount of spending per head of population as the Scots receive.
No more "West Lothian Question" style democracy and
No more "Barnet Formular" funding. We, the English  pay the same taxes so should receive the same standards of Democracy as the Scots. We don't want more, We don't want less. Just the same. Thats fair.
